summary: Master of Science graduate in petroleum geology and geophysics, with excellent understanding of stratigraphy, geomechanics, geotechnical engineering and 3D seismic analysis. Focused on reservoir characterization and completion. Comprehensive knowledge of reservoir anisotropy analysis techniques using seismic and mechanical properties. Geological, geophysical and engineering data integration using a variety of softwares for better reservoir characterization. Experienced in laboratory procedures and soil and rock mechanics
